trans-unit.source: DAQ_Logger_module : This module lets you log data from one or many detectors defined in the dashboard. You can log data in a binary hierarchical hdf5 file or towards a sql database
trans-unit.target: DAQ_Logger_module : This module lets you log data from one or many detectors defined in the dashboard. You can log data in a binary hierarchical hdf5 file or towards a sql database

trans-unit.source: DAQ_Move_module : used to control/drive an actuator (stand alone and/or automated). Any number of these modules can be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: DAQ_Move_module : used to control/drive an actuator (stand alone and/or automated). Any number of these modules can be instantiated.

trans-unit.source: DAQ_Scan_module : This module lets you configure automated data acquisition from one or many detectors defined in the dashboard as a function or one or more actuators defined also in the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: DAQ_Scan_module : This module lets you configure automated data acquisition from one or many detectors defined in the dashboard as a function or one or more actuators defined also in the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: DAQ_Viewer_module : used to control/drive a detector (stand alone and/or automated). Any number of these modules can be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: DAQ_Viewer_module : used to control/drive a detector (stand alone and/or automated). Any number of these modules can be instantiated.

trans-unit.source: Dashboard_module : This is the module that will initialize actuators and detectors given the need of your particular experiment. You configure the dashboard using an interface for quick launch of various configurations.
trans-unit.target: Dashboard_module : This is the module that will initialize actuators and detectors given the need of your particular experiment. You configure the dashboard using an interface for quick launch of various configurations.

trans-unit.source: First, to provide a complete interface to perform automated measurements or logging data without having to write a user/interface for each new experiment, this is under the Dashboard_module environment and its two extensions.
trans-unit.target: First, to provide a complete interface to perform automated measurements or logging data without having to write a user/interface for each new experiment, this is under the Dashboard_module environment and its two extensions.

trans-unit.source: It is divided in three main modules:

trans-unit.target: 用Python进行模块化数据采集

trans-unit.source: Published under the CeCILL-B FREE SOFTWARE LICENSE
trans-unit.target: 根据CeCILL-B免费软件许可证发布。

trans-unit.source: PyMoDAQ, Modular Data Acquisition with Python, is a set of python modules used to interface any kind of experiments. It simplifies the interaction with detector and actuator hardware to go straight to the data acquisition of interest.
trans-unit.target: PyMoDAQ, Modular Data Acquisition with Python, is a set of python modules used to interface any kind of experiments. It simplifies the interaction with detector and actuator hardware to go straight to the data acquisition of interest.

trans-unit.source: Second, to provide various tools (modules) to easily build custom apps
trans-unit.target: Second, to provide various tools (modules) to easily build custom apps

trans-unit.source: The detectors and the actuators are represented and manipulated using two generic modules:
trans-unit.target: 检测器和执行器用两个通用模块来表示和操作。

trans-unit.source: and many others to simplify any application development.
trans-unit.target: 和许多其他的应用程序,以简化任何应用程序的开发。
